name: Journey of the Fox
description:
Design your Sword and follow your fate...

Follow the Journey of a boy and a fox, as they must escape their fate, the darkness follows and looms closer as you battle your way through creatures of the gathering darkness, solve puzzles to escape the forests, caves, and other places you will visit on your travels.

Journey of the fox is a single player story driven puzzle game with elements of combat thrown in. As of now the game is still in beta.
Further along the ability to create your own shield, maybe even customise your character will be added along with some unlock-able secrets and bonus levels.
